name: candidate
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a person who is competing to get a job or elected position

example.eg: There are three candidates standing in the election.

trans_examp.trans_en: a person or thing considered likely to receive or experience something
trans_examp.trans_cn: 可能有…结局者，被认定会经历…者

example.eg: The English Department is a likely candidate for staff cuts.
example.egtrans: 英语系很有可能要裁员。

trans_examp.trans_en: someone who is taking an exam

example.eg: Candidates must write their names on the top page of the exam paper.
example.egtrans: 考生必须将自己的名字写在试卷首页。
